bptree

Class NonLeafNode<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bptree.Node<K>
      • bptree.NonLeafNode<K>

  • public class NonLeafNode<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K>>
extends Node<K>
    The NonLeafNode class implements non-leaf nodes in a B+-tree.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
